# WorkflowForge

> High-performance, zero-dependency workflow orchestration framework for .NET with microsecond-level execution and minimal memory footprint. Uses an industrial metaphor (Forge, Foundry, Smith, Operations) for building workflows.

## About

WorkflowForge is an open-source .NET library for building high-performance workflows with a clean, fluent API. It provides built-in compensation (saga pattern): override RestoreAsync in your operation to support rollback; the base class provides a no-op default â€” operations that don't override it are safely skipped during compensation. Lifecycle hooks and a comprehensive extension ecosystem with zero version conflicts.

## Key Features

- Zero-dependency core library
- 11-540x faster than alternatives (Workflow Core, Elsa Workflows)
- 9-573x less memory allocation
- Fluent builder API with operation lifecycle hooks
- Built-in saga pattern: override RestoreAsync for compensation; base class no-op skips non-restorable operations
- 13 NuGet packages (1 core + 11 extensions + testing)
- ILRepack dependency internalization for extensions
